title: EfkarpidisDOC2EBOOK5x82024-10-28.docx
summary: “An exhilarating adventure that is well worth the ride! This novel, written by Dionisios Efkarpidis, combines science fiction with extreme horror. The story is based in a town called Freedom Basin where the main protagonist, Cosmos, lives. Hell breaks loose, and everyone is on the move.” “It’s a quick read that kept me on the seat of my pants—I could hardly breathe!
